content: Its amazing. Powell is quite an honorable man but the moment his opinions and observations stray from the accepted ideology, hes automatically out of the Republican party, and practically a traitor. Seems pretty fascist. Democrats do it too though, I suppose. They pretty much kicked Lieberman out of the Democratic party. Maybe Lieberman and Powell should form a third party.

title: Powell returns fire on Cheney

content: National security is certainly something Dick Cheney is well versed in. Much more so than the president. His tenure as Secretare of Defence alone is evidence of that. And his foresight is prooven. For example... Cheney publicly expressed concern that nations such as Iraq, Iran, and North Korea, could acquire nuclear components after the collapse of the Soviet Union in 1991. The end of the Cold War, the fall of the Soviet Union, and the disintegration of the Warsaw Pact obliged the first Bush Administration to reevaluate the North Atlantic Treaty Organization's (NATO's) purpose and makeup. Cheney believed that NATO should remain the foundation of European security relationships and that it would remain important to the United States in the long term; he urged the alliance to lend more assistance to the new democracies in Eastern Europe. "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Cheney"
reply: National security is certainly something Dick Cheney is well versed in. Much more so than the president. His tenure as Secretare of Defence alone is evidence of that. And his foresight is prooven. For example... Cheney publicly expressed concern that nations such as Iraq, Iran, and North Korea, could acquire nuclear components after the collapse of the Soviet Union in 1991. The end of the Cold War, the fall of the Soviet Union, and the disintegration of the Warsaw Pact obliged the first Bush Administration to reevaluate the North Atlantic Treaty Organization's (NATO's) purpose and makeup. Cheney believed that NATO should remain the foundation of European security relationships and that it would remain important to the United States in the long term; he urged the alliance to lend more assistance to the new democracies in Eastern Europe. "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Cheney"
title: Powell returns fire on Cheney

content: quote: National security is certainly something Dick Cheney is well versed in Funny. The war in Iraq only turned around when Bush did 2 things that many Democrats (and a few Republicans) had called for since almost the beginning: 1) fire Rumsfeld, and 2) send more troops. President Bush finally did that, against the advice of Cheney, and what the heck, things improved.
quote: National security is certainly something Dick Cheney is well versed in
reply: Funny. The war in Iraq only turned around when Bush did 2 things that many Democrats (and a few Republicans) had called for since almost the beginning: 1) fire Rumsfeld, and 2) send more troops. President Bush finally did that, against the advice of Cheney, and what the heck, things improved.
title: Powell returns fire on Cheney

content: There is no evidence that I am aware of that Vice President Cheney allowed the terrorist attacks of 9-11 to occur. Perhaps someone may provide proof to the contrary. One of the results of WWII was a divided Korea. This is still an area of great concern over 60 years after the end of the war. There are, for exaqmple, reports that NK just tested an atomic weapon. Must be Roosevelt's fault. That is if I were to use the logic of khj.
